details.title: TERMS AND CONDITIONS
desc: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using this website.

details.title: CONDITIONS OF USE
desc: Items may be placed on our picklist based on a group level assignment (selling team) and not on an indiviual level assignment (John Smith)
It is my responsibility to make sure that I have completed all required training prior to ordering samples of presciption drugs or promotional items for those products.
I am responsible for ensuring that my interactions and discussions with customers are consistent with GS Values, Police and Comercial Practices ad Procedures.
I will only order materials for which I have completed all requiring training.

transferPage.title: Transfer DTP Limits
transferPage.subTitle: Use this page to transfer your DTP limits.
transferPage.warningTransferNotAllowed: Transfer request denied: You have exceeded the allowed transfer limit or are outside the permitted window. Further transfers are currently not allowed.

apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_GENERIC: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the issue continues.
apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE: Our services are temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_INTRASERVICE_REQUEST_FAILED: The transfer quantity exceeds the available stock or is invalid. Please verify your quantity and try again.
apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_INVALID_PRODUCT: This product cannot be transferred. Please choose a different product.
apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_REQUIRED_REP: A representative ID is missing for one of the representatives and is required for this transfer.
apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_REQUIRED_PRODUCTS: Failed to retrieve the product list for the selected transfer type. Please try again.
apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_INTRASERVICE_WITH_PRODUCT: Transfer Failed. Please ensure that both selected territories have necessary product allocations in the Ti Allocate system.
apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_INTRASERVICE_REQUEST_FAILED: Unable to complete Intra-Service request. Due to quantity mismatch.
apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_TRANSFER_UNIT_MUST_GEATER_T: Transfer unit must be greater than zero.
apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_TRANSFER_PRODUCT_ID_DUPLICA: Product Id is duplicate in collection.
apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_INVALID_TRANSFER_DATE: Transfer date must be today's date.
apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_INVALID_TO_AND_FROM_TERRITO: To Territory Id and From Territory Id must not be same.
apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_SUBMISSION_NOT_ALLOWED_WHIL: You cannot submit a transfer while impersonating a user.

apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_REORDER_REQUEST_PRODUCT_QUA: You have reached the quantity limit for this product.
apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_REORDER_REQUEST_PRODUCT_THR: The quantity for this product exceeds the allowed threshold.
apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_REORDER_REQUEST_PRODUCT_OUT: This product is out of stock.
apiMessageCode.SERVER_ERROR_REORDER_REQUEST_PRODUCT_UNA: This product is unavailable. Please check your order quantities and thresholds.
